divs: sighting detailsdisappeared in clouds one after one maybe helicopters? but i have never seen here 3 helicopters together at the same time observed from about 10-30 kilometers with my own eyes and cheap binoculars, 5 to 10 minutes other person saw it too probably over forest\lake not urban area
